Package org.klomp.snark.dht

Class DHTTracker

java.lang.Object
org.klomp.snark.dht.DHTTracker
class DHTTracker extends Object
The tracker stores peers, i.e. Dest hashes (not nodes).
Since:
0.9.2
Author:
zzz
